title: Red lentil and chilli soup
ingredients: ['400g red lentils (soaked for 24 hours)', '1-2 sticks of celery, chopped', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '4 red chillies, chopped', '1 fresh green or jalapeno chilli, sliced', "2 teaspoons vegetable stock granules (or premade stock, but don't add water later) - add less powder stock than you do water as more will make the dish salty", '2 carrots, chopped', '2 onions, chopped', 'water', '1/2 pumpkin, peeled and chopped', '1 tablespoon grated root ginger, or to taste', '4-5 cloves of crushed garlic', 'ground cardamon (or pods)', 'turmeric', 'cumin seeds', 'garam masala']
